body_html: I think that it is not easy to solve due to the current implementation. Creating processes are rather time-costing on Windows so we'll have to change the whole implementation of DataLoader on Windows, make it spawn constant child processes and keep them alive. There'll be much work to achieve this goal.

body: I think that it is not easy to solve due to the current implementation. Creating processes are rather time-costing on Windows so we'll have to change the whole implementation of DataLoader on Windows, make it spawn constant child processes and keep them alive. There'll be much work to achieve this goal.
